FAQ / Wave 2 / Battle Cards /
View On FortressMaximus.io

Escape Route

  1. Can Escape Route be used on a triple changer in Alt 2 to flip into Alt 1 and vice-versa? Are triple changers affected by Roll-Out if they are not in bot mode? [Source: WotC]
    Escape Route and Roll Out! convert characters from Bot mode to Alt mode. They cannot convert Triple Changers from one Alt mode to another Alt mode.
